Amit is agile... As soon as he hit the floor he was on the phones and engaging with prospects. No fear about engaging in conversation because he has that ability to share experience across multiple topics and personality types. Amit is a team player, always staying late and doing what it took to get the numbers and deliver for his team. Everyone runs into personal challenges outside of work that would set anyone back. Amit had one of the roughest 18 months i have every seen of any employee but kept focused, and drew energy from his team and Infusionsoft to provide his family what they needed, and keep himself in a mindset that was truly amazing.

January 29, 2016, Amit (AK) reported directly to Ryan

I worked under Ryan Parks for a year at Infusionsoft.  I pride myself as someone who is very self-sufficient and doesn't need much to hit my goals.  However Ryan wasn't okay with that and for that I am grateful.  He pushed me and challenged me in ways that not only elevated my personal numbers, but it helped our team crush our goals month in and month out.  He understands how to manage to the person, not managing a team of 12-15 as a whole and our team responded greatly to that attention to detail.  Ryan understands the sales process better than any manager i've worked with before.  He never tries to force his selling style on you, he helps you utilize your skills that you already have and makes those skills better.  I would literally follow Ryan Parks to any place he were to go to because I was the BEST version of myself while reporting directly to him.

I have had the extreme pleasure to work under Chris Boyster for most of my tenure at Infusionsoft.  Chris may be the most intelligent individual I have ever come across and the most passionate manager that I have ever worked for.  He understands the complexities of running 20+ individuals separately to achieve their highest level of sales success all while still being able to commit and exceed to sales goals as a team.  Personally, Chris has inspired me through his hard work, passion, and dedication for me to give him my absolute best everyday I stepped into work.  He gave me the tools and coaching I needed to now become a consistent top sales representative for Infusionsoft.  Chris is an invaluable asset to any company he works for.

summary: You were born to win, but to be a winner, you must plan to win, prepare to win, and expect to win. - Zig ZiglarI have a passion for helping businesses succeed and look for all opportunities to do so.How I may be able to help you: -Introductions to synergistic contacts in my network-Introductions to other businesses that you see value in working with-Feedback on sales growth & marketing automation related inquires-TruSelling Methodology experience-Social Selling strategies-SAAS & CRM strategies-Brand Methodology-Understanding the 3 Pillars in The Campfire Effect to increase sales I have been in sales for 15 years now starting in 2001 selling enterprise businesses Yellow Page and web ad space for Verizon Information Systems inside and outside sales.  Between then and the present I have owned my own company, excelled in Software Sales, Real Estate, and Enterprise marketing firms and have loved every job I have had while far exceeding my goals.  My passion is and always will be helping others succeed.  Specialties: Sales Methodology Design, Direct and Channel Sales, Marketing Automation (RPM), Team building, process & procedure design, executive presentations, CRM, business application software, motivational and leadership coaching, Productivity & Time Management, SAAS.
name: Amit (AK) Kumar
title: I help SaaS, marketing, and advertising businesses succeed
